member.name: WCS_PROFILE_MANAGEMENT_SCOPE
member.summary: Specifies the scope of a profile management operation, such as associating a profile with a device.

member.name: WCS_PROFILE_MANAGEMENT_SCOPE.WCS_PROFILE_MANAGEMENT_SCOPE_SYSTEM_WIDE
member.summary: Indicates that the profile management operation affects all users.

member.name: WCS_PROFILE_MANAGEMENT_SCOPE.WCS_PROFILE_MANAGEMENT_SCOPE_CURRENT_USER
member.summary: Indicates that the profile management operation affects only the current user.
